name: SocksTalk
description: A smart sock pairing system that uses AI to match and communicate with its pair, ensuring you never lose a sock again.

name: PurrfectPower
description: A renewable energy company that harnesses the purring vibrations of cats to generate electricity.

name: MoodMunchies
description: A snack vending machine that suggests snacks based on your current mood, analyzed through facial recognition technology.

name: NapNav
description: A mobile app that locates the nearest and most comfortable napping spots in any city for busy professionals.

name: RainbootsRecharge
description: Eco-friendly boots that generate and store kinetic energy from walking in the rain, which can be used to charge your devices.

name: BarkBuddy
description: An AI-driven assistant that translates your dog's barks and behavior into human language.

name: HoloHome
description: A home decoration service using holographic technology to change your interior design on demand.
